t: Amazon’s Slogan: What “Work Hard, Have Fun, Make History” Tagline Teaches | Hook Agency
s: November 9, 2024 - In this article, we’ll unpack Amazon’s slogan, its evolution over time, and key lessons in branding that you can apply to your own business. ... Amazon’s slogan, “Work Hard, Have Fun, Make History,” resonates with its employees and shapes the brand’s public image.
